## About {#about}

<div class="about-section fade-in" style="background-color: #FFF8DC; border-radius: 12px;">

<div class="about-content">

I’m **Xinran Li**, a Master’s student in Business Analytics at **Boston University**.  
With hands-on experience across luxury retail (KENZO), asset management (ZhongGeng Fund), and sustainability (Co2 Lab),  
I enjoy bridging the gap between business goals and data insights.

I specialize in:

- 📊 Data Visualization (Power BI, Tableau)  
- 🧠 Causal Inference, A/B Testing  
- 🛠️ Python • SQL • R

Outside of work, I love hiking in nature 🥾, exploring new coffee shops ☕, watercolor painting 🎨, and playing piano 🎹.
